nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Welcome, Operative. Ready for deployment?

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Here are your current deployment options. Choose wisely - each requires different preparation.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: A Heavy Propulsion Surveillance Rod will be rocketed down to the planet surface. Its impact zone will be somewhat random, but you should be able to track its signal with your scanner.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Your objective: Locate the rod and retrieve the sample payload. Then find a location with clear weather conditions to establish uplink with our ship in orbit. We'll beam you back once connection is confirmed.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: It's in your best interest to have a backup plan incase you are interrupted during the mission. Be sure to bring medical supplies and light weaponry.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: We're deploying you as a Combat Medic. You'll receive a Medic Badge and enhanced assistive capabilities.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Your role is to assist operatives from OTHER squads who are down. Each successful field heal earns you Medic Credits.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Note: Healing your own squad doesn't count toward rewards. We need you out there helping strangers to foster goodwill across all operations.

choices.text: What can I spend Medic Credits on?

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Medic Credits can be used to purchase discounted medical equipment from a medical vendor or exchanged for common currency.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Deep Extraction Mandate. We've deployed a Heavy Bore Drill to the planet surface. This thing punches straight through the crust into cavernous networks below.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Your objective: Locate the drill site and descend into the caverns. Down there you'll find rare earth minerals, crystalline deposits, and... other things. Creatures that haven't seen daylight in millennia.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You can go for a long time and find increasingly rare materials, but it will be more difficult to return in one piece.

choices.text: How do I get back out?

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You'll need to return back to the drill, though the ascent is often much more trivial than the descent, so you must exercise caution.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Subterranean predators. Blind, but with incredible senses. They are all in some way territorial and will attack if they feel threatened.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Checking your deployment record...

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You have no active deployments. Ready when you are.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You're currently deployed on Survey Planet in Orbit. Locate the Surveillance Rod, retrieve the payload, and find clear weather for extraction.

choices.text: I want to abandon this mission

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You're deployed as a Combat Medic on Rescue Operative. Assist operatives from other squads to earn Medic Credits.

choices.text: I want to abandon this mission

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: You're on a Deep Extraction Mandate. The Heavy Bore Drill is waiting. Descend, gather resources, and return before it's too late.

choices.text: I want to abandon this mission

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Are you sure? Abandoning a mission means forfeiting any progress and potential rewards.

nodes.speaker: npc
nodes.text: Mission abandoned. Your deployment record has been updated. Come back when you're ready for a new assignment.
